name: website

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

description: 1. This is the Professional Social Networking Website, similar to LinkedIn.  Here, people can add their profile details, connect with others and posts. 2.  It is a business and employment-oriented service that operates via websites. 3. The security and the authenticity of the users are also verified. They are asked to verify their email id in order to confirm their login for the first time. 4. The user has all the control over the profile, post, likes and comments.  5. It has github integration as well. So the user's top 5 github projects will be displayed.
author: abhishek narayan
